title: 42. You plan to deploy an application on an autoscaled managed instances group. The application uses a tomcat server and runs on port 8080. You want to access the application on https://www.example.com. You want to follow Google recommended practices. What services would you use?
alternatives: A. Google DNS, Google CDN, SSL Proxy Load Balancer
B. Google Domains, Cloud DNS private zone, SSL Proxy Load Balancer
C. Google Domains, Cloud DNS private zone, HTTP(S) Load Balancer
D. Google Domains, Cloud DNS, HTTP(S) Load Balancer
